title: HYDERABAD POLO AND RIDING CLUB -  Polo
text: HYDERABAD POLO AND RIDING CLUB - Polo +91 – 9177 00 00 56 info@hprc.co.in Member Login Pay Now toggle navigation Home About us Who We Are Mission Vision Values Managing Committee Start Riding About Riding Packages Beginners Riding Programme Intermediate Riding Programme Advanced Riding Programme Polo Equestrian Polo About Polo Stick & Ball Chukkers Events Past Events Upcoming Events SPORTS CENTRE Tennis Badminton Squash Swimming pool Basketball Futsal Gym Sauna Upcoming SportS Event Packages Gold Package Platinum Package RESTAURANTS Chukkers Snaffles Bistro BANQUETS Membership Events & Media Photo Gallery Video Gallery News Events Newsletters Blogs Contact Us Polo Advanced Riding Programme Polo Polo Our Advanced Polo Programme is designed for riders passionate about the thrilling sport of polo. This specialized training focuses on enhancing your polo skills, including mallet work, riding techniques, and strategic play. With guidance from expert polo instructors, you'll learn advanced maneuvers, team coordination, and competitive strategies. Perfect for those aiming to compete or excel in polo, this programme offers a comprehensive and challenging experience. Join us to master the exhilarating sport of polo and take your game to the next level. Timings: 6.00am to 10.00am & 4.00pm to 9.00pm Charges: Riding Fee: 3 Rides per week x 4 weeks i.e., 12 Rides per month @ Rs.295 per Ride Rs.3,540 Coaching Fee: For the entire package For one month Rs.5,900 Explore Home About Us Membership Login Start Riding Polo News & Events Contact Us Quick links Apply for Membership Pay Now e-Brochure Past Events Facilities Sport Center Restaurants Banquets Address Near Mrugavani Resort and Spa, Aziz Nagar Village, Gandipet, Ranga Reddy District, Hyderabad, Telangana, India - 500075 reaz@hprc.co.in +91 9177000056 View Location On Map Gallery © 2005 – 2024.
